meanings.sent1: The steak was so chewy that I had to chew it for a long time.
meanings.sent2: The gum became chewy after I put it in my mouth for a while.
meanings.sent3: I tried to eat the chewy candy quietly, but it made loud chewing sounds.
meanings.sent4: The tough steak felt like chewing on a rubber band, it was so chewy.
meanings.sent5: The chewy bread was like a workout for my jaw muscles.

meanings.definition: having a texture that is tough and resilient to the bite
meanings.sent1: The caramel was so chewy that it stuck to my teeth.
meanings.sent2: The taffy was chewy and stretched when I pulled it apart.
meanings.sent3: The chewy pizza crust was like trying to bite through a rubber mat.
meanings.sent4: The chewy steak felt like chewing on a piece of leather, it was so tough.
meanings.sent5: The chewy candy was like trying to eat a tire, it was so resilient to my bite.
